Texts.Eng: Craft a ^green;Parasol^reset; at a ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; and return.
I've heard of some fancy stuff in my day, but I'd most like ta see me a ^orange;Mining Laser^reset; 'afore I die. Make me one in a ^orange;Tinker Table^reset; would ya?
You've made an ol' Novakid happy today. Thanks so much, friend. Take this unusual stone I found as a thanks. It looks valuable.
